text: 4|84|ennal(nabiye,) ni allahuvinre margattil yud'dham ceytu kealluka. ninre svantam karyamallate ninneat sasikkappetunnatalla. satyavisvasikalil ni prerana celuttukayum ceyyuka. satyanisedhikalute akramanasaktiye allahu tatuttutannekkum. allahu erravum kututal akramanasaktiyullavanum atikathinamayi siksikkunnavanumakunnu
